Expose.definition: to subject to risk from a harmful action or condition
Expose.origin: [all of which I shall for sale at public auction " Detroit Law Journal "]

1.definition: to subject to risk from a harmful action or condition

sub_terms.a: to make (one) open to liability or financial loss
sub_terms.b: to leave (a child) uncared-for and lacking shelter from the elements

2.definition: to cause to be visible or open to view

sub_terms.a: to offer publicly for sale [all of which I shall for sale at public auction ""]
sub_terms.b: to purposely uncover (one's private body parts) or leave open to view in a place or situation in which such conduct is likely to be deemed offensive or indecent esp. as set forth by statute see also
